did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: The Bride of Abydos: a Turkish tale 1831
did.abstract: Manuscript copy, by an unknown person, of Lord Byron's work, The Bride of Abydos. Each page is finely lettered to imitate the appearance of a printed book.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized by canto.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Manuscript copy, by an unknown person, of Lord Byron's work, The Bride of Abydos. Each page is finely lettered to imitate the appearance of a printed book.
First error in 1st edition, 1st issue (Canto I, line 300) not corrected. Other three have been corrected.
The 1st edition had been published in 1813; it was printed in London by T. Davison for John Murray.
